      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Texture SubTexture.convertToCapableTexture()
      This is useful for when you want the functionality of a real Texture from a SubTexture, such as GL_REPEAT, which is impossible with SubTextures.

      This is useful for when you want the functionality of a real Texture from a SubTexture, such as GL_REPEAT, which is impossible with SubTextures.
